name: Skyline Superior Room | 2 Queens
description: Located in the Skyline Tower, this dual queen room offers comfortable accommodations for up to four guests. Features two queen-size beds, High Definition TV, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, refreshment center, mini-refrigerator, and complimentary coffee.
shortDescription: Dual queen room in the Skyline Tower for up to four guests.

meta.title: Skyline Superior Room 2 Queens – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Skyline Superior Room with two queens at Eldorado Resort Reno – spacious accommodations in the Skyline Tower.

testimonials.quote: Skyline Superior Room | 2 Queens was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Emily W.

testimonials.quote: Visited Skyline Superior Room | 2 Queens during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Lynn W.
